posts.post_title: FS - Two graded Clark Griffiths with Bat, one Tolstoi (SOLD) one SC.
posts.post_content:
For Sale - Two Clark Griffiths with Bat, prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking. Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.

T206 Clark Griffith with Bat, Tolstoi - SGC 5 (SOLD).

T206 Clark Griffith with Bat, SC 350/30 - PSA 2.5 $240 venmo no fee or $248.00 pp gs.
